definition[0]: a monumental achievement, piece of work etc is very important and is usually based on many years of work
example[0]: a monumental contribution to the field of medicine
example[1]: Charles Darwin’s monumental study, ‘The Origin of Species’
definition[1]: extremely large, bad, good, impressive etc
example[2]: Banks and building societies were yesterday accused of monumental incompetence.
example[4]: There was a monumental traffic jam on the freeway.
definition[2]: relating to a monument or built as a monument
